Name: Mitzi Agnes Mantis
Description:
Mitzi was a theater performer and singer whose beaten body was found by two farmhands. George Bartholomew was later sentenced to 3-6 years in prison. 

> The club's "leading lady" had been a very attractive fellow indeed. [She] had been the torch singer of the resort, wearing a ; dazzling gown that revealed [her] powdered shoulders, and a wig of dainty curls. A chorus of other female impersonators had minced around [her] during [her] numbers.
